FuncDef: The reset ospf frr command resets OSPF IP FRR. The reset ospf frr command resets OSPF IP FRR.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process. If this parameter is not specified, FRR is reset in all OSPF processes.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: This command is a maintenance command. It can be used to forcibly reset FRR without deleting the FRR configuration.
